description: This is the perfect drink for when you are hosting a party. Simply keep some rum-based cocktails in your refrigerator beforehand, shake it up with ice, and pour it into glasses! Garnish, however desired to make things more interesting or serve as a plain old mixer.
name: White Pumpkin

recipeInstructions.name: Pour rum and almond milk into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well to combine, add honey, and shake once more to dissolve.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour rum and almond milk into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well to combine, add honey, and shake once more to dissolve.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into glasses (or mason jar) and top with pumpkin spice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses (or mason jar) and top with pumpkin spice.
